title: “Tyler Cowen’s AI campus”
description: That is a short essay by Arnold Kling. Excerpt: Tyler’s Vision As a student, you work with a mentor. At the beginning of each term, you and your mentor decide which courses you will take. If there are other students on campus taking them, great. If not, maybe you can take them with students at [...]The post “Tyler Cowen’s AI campus” appeared first on Marginal REVOLUTION.

title: Global sports face challenges from 'AI slop' misinformation
description: A study by AI risk management platform Alethea into the surge in artificial intelligence-generated fake content, dubbed "AI slop," has warned sports teams, leagues and fans of the risks posed by increasingly sophisticated digital misinformation.

title: World : Irish AI Minister Voices Concerns About Xâs Grok Tool
description: LONDON, Jan 17 (Bernama-Anadolu) -- Ireland expressed concerns about US social media company X's AI (artificial intelligence) tool Grok following a meeting with the company’s executives, Anadolu Ajansi reported.

title: Kodiak AI, Inc. (NASDAQ:KDK) Receives $15.90 Average Price Target from Brokerages
description: Shares of Kodiak AI, Inc. title: Who Is Ashley St. Clair? Mother of Elon Musk’s Child and the Woman Suing Grok AI Over Indecent Images
description: Ashley St. Clair sues Elon Musk’s xAI over Grok’s sexually explicit deepfakes, sparks countersuits, and drags custody, child support, and family drama into the public eye. Legal and personal stakes soar.
